channel.title: [317]NPC glitch help[317]
channel.description: When I have NPCs just standing around they glitch. They glitch by trying to walk in place, so it's like they are shaking and it's annoying. So, if someone can help me fix this problem it would be great. :) I know this is gonna be a big surprise it's delta base... I don't give a shit. :D

item.title: [317]NPC glitch help[317]

item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

When I have NPCs just standing around they glitch. They glitch by trying to walk in place, so it’s like they are shaking and it’s annoying. So, if someone can help me fix this problem it would be great. I know this is gonna be a big surprise it’s delta base… I don’t give a shit.
